data.eml:eml: Morphological variation in Xenoxybelis boulengeri (Procter, 1923) (Serpentes, Xenodontinae, Philodryadini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Prudente, Ana Lúcia Da Costa, Silva, Márcio André Amorim Da, Rocha, Wáldima Alves Da, Franco, Francisco Luís (2008): Morphological variation in Xenoxybelis boulengeri (Procter, 1923) (Serpentes, Xenodontinae, Philodryadini). Zootaxa 1743: 53-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181572
